name: futu_2-backend-server
description: Backend for handling communication between clients and sensors

scripts.lint: npm run jscs && npm run eslint
scripts.test: npm run lint && babel-node ./tests/*.js -- | faucet || exit 0
scripts.test-continuous: npm run test --silent && npm run watch-files -c 'npm run test --silent'
scripts.watch: npm run start && npm run watch-files -c 'npm run start --silent'
scripts.build: npm run clean $$ mkdir dist && npm run babel-build && npm run copytemplate
scripts.postinstall: echo ------- Postinstall time -------; npm run build
